name: HeroBox
description: An subscription e-commerce site that delivers curated Marvel comics each month. Built with React and CSS grid, featuring a login using Passport and Credit Card payment using Stripe.

name: SoilTime
description: An application that shows you information about the soil and plant life in a given area. Uses NASA's Distributed Active Archive Center for Biochemical Dynamics database. Built using CSS Grid and features a custom animation.

name: CinemaVox
description: An application that takes the plot of your favorite movie, and reads it aloud in multiple speeds and accents. Built using Materialize and uses 3 APIs (Voice RSS Text to Speech, The Open Movie Database, Youtube)
